dcterms:creator: A. Alharbi
H. Dong
X. Yi
P. Abeysekara
dcterms:description: A dataset containing non-privacy-sensitive user profile attributes fetched from Twitter APIs, consisting of 4,030 public Twitter accounts (2,015 cloned accounts and their corresponding victim accounts) and 20,152 additional public accounts for noise, totaling 35,122 accounts.
dcterms:title: Twitter Dataset
